entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm except 5 cm over southern sections. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
